name: paint waster
description:
apk for android.

options:

  • shaking tablet: saving to screenshot.jpg file
  • pressing color: chosing color
  • press c: clear screen
  • press f: normal/freaky lines (from same point)
  • press l: squared/rounded metod for drawing lines
  • press kamera: take picture and put it for background
  • press b: clear background and fill it
  • slider: brush width
  • p: color of brush
  • square: drawing (just) empty squares from lu to rd points
  • circle: drawing full/empty circle from start x,y with radius final (x,y) - start (x,y)
  • line: drawing straight line from start x,y to final x,y
